nodes.text: Valahari was a planet in the galaxy. The planet acclaimed fame for its native starfighter aces and engineers.

Valahari was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The planet was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Hero of the Confederacy, the third and final story arc of the monthly Star Wars: The Clone Wars comic series, written by Henry Gilroy and Steven Melching.
